description: works well, there's options for the sound it makes, runs great on my phone. plz add mobile compatible to your metadata, you'll get more downloads!
I have tried all the alternatives, and this one is the most feature-rich, precise and have a modern GTK3 GUI. Simply the best!
summary: Simply the best metronome available on Linux!

description: My only complaint is the lack of dark mode. This will likey keep me from using gmetrognome until dark mode is available.

Was looking for a metronome that can provide different accents. This works with all the features that I need from a metronome app. Has a clean design, is a flatpak so sandboxed, has option to save different profiles, and is light n fast!
